document.full_text: a day before the season started, jason terry had a tattoo of the championship trophy inked on his right biceps, a sign of supreme confidence in the mavericks' mission to win a title.
document.title: maverick hopes for title to leave permanent mark
lines_and_colors: a day before the season started, jason terry had a tattoo of the championship trophy inked on his right biceps, a sign of supreme confidence in the mavericks' mission to win a title.
